greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (sum of totatives of n ) / (2^(omega(n)-1)); a(n) = A023896(n) / A007875(n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[(n/2)*EulerPhi[n]*2^(1 - PrimeNu[n]), {n, 2, 50}]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, May 22 2017 *)
program: (PARI) concat([1], for(n=2,50, print1((n/2)*eulerphi(n)*2^(1-omega(n)), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 22 2017
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Sep 29 2014
